translation.en: [Billy] Aren't you a little old to be playing with dolls, Michael?
translation.zh: 米高 这么大了还玩玩偶吗？

translation.en: What do you think, Billy?
Is my kid gonna love this thing, or what?
translation.zh: 我的孩子会喜欢这个吗？

translation.en: Sure, he'll love it.
He looks just like it.
Yeah, he is pretty cute, isn't he? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 对啊 他真的很可爱 不是吗？

translation.en: Do you know what day it is?
translation.zh: 你知道今天是什么日子吗？

translation.en: Tuesday.
It's October 1st.
It was exactly ten years ago till I first came to America.
translation.zh: 十年前的今天 是我来到美国的第一天

translation.en: No shit.
Hey, happy anniversary, Billy.
I'll tell you what. Ten years deserves a celebration.
translation.zh: 我说啊 十周年是值得庆祝的

translation.en: How about I take you out for a drink after work? Come on.
translation.zh: 不如放工后我请你喝杯饮料？来吧

translation.en: I can't be too late, I'm meeting a girl at nine.
translation.zh: 我不能待得太迟 我约了女友9点见面

translation.en: She wants to help me celebrate, too.
[Michael] If you could party after the graveyard shift.
translation.zh: 若你在值夜班后还能去庆祝

translation.en: You got a lot of stamina.
You know what I mean?
Shit.
Look like the fucking Indians got another one.
translation.zh: 看来可恶的印地安人又搞事了

translation.en: We better check it out, Billy.
translation.zh: 我们最好去看看 比利

translation.en: This is car 17 to dispatch.
We got a Code 10-22.
Stripped truck, Sector H, right off Longfellow Avenue.
translation.zh: 有辆被撬开的卡车 停放在H区朗费洛大道附近

translation.en: We'll get right back to you.
[dispatcher] 10-4.
[Michael] Careful, Billy.
[Billy] Michael, check it out.
Jesus!
Christ, don't... don't shoot me.
translation.zh: 天啊 不 别开枪

translation.en: Take anything you want, just don't shoot me.
translation.zh: 你要什么都拿去吧 别对我开枪就好

translation.en: [Michael] Relax.
We're cops, okay?
You fellas got one hell of a friendly city here,
translation.zh: 你们这城市真是该死地亲善

translation.en: you know that?
Just stopped for a red light and boom.
translation.zh: 我只不过在红灯区停了一会儿 就变成这样了

translation.en: Oh, they got my computers!
translation.zh: 喔 他们偷了我的电脑

translation.en: Oh, look at my rig!
My poor rig!
You stopped at a red light in the South Bronx
with a truckload of computers?
translation.zh: 在南布朗克斯红绿灯前停车？

translation.en: [Michael] Where you from, pal?
Texas.
[Michael] Figures.
Welcome to New York.
Hey.
You're not taking that in, are you?
translation.zh: 你不会把那玩偶带进去吧？

translation.en: Can't leave it in the car, someone will steal it.
translation.zh: 我才不会放在车上 有人会偷去呢

translation.en: Don't give me a hard time. Get in there.
Hey, that's enough, huh?
translation.zh: 喂 那就够了 好吗？

translation.en: Come on, let's go! Let's do it!
translation.zh: 好了 走吧 现在就干吧！

translation.en: Okay, I'm going to kick some fucking ass!
translation.zh: 好 我这就去把他们打得落花流水

translation.en: I'm gonna hit the can.
Another round for my two friends.
translation.zh: 替我的两位朋友来多一轮

translation.en: You got it.
All right, big man. Close that door!
translation.zh: 好了 大个子 把门关起来！

translation.en: -[shatters] -Nobody move!
-[man #1] Michael, get the back door! -[Michael] Okay!
translation.zh: 麦克 你到后门去把风！

translation.en: All right, everybody over here. Get over to that jukebox!
translation.zh: 好了 所有人听着到自动点唱机这边来

translation.en: Let's go! Move! Move!
[man #1] All right. I wanna see rings, watches, wallets.
translation.zh: 好 我要看见戒指、手表和项链都放在这

translation.en: Let's go!
You, get over there!
Hurry up! Hurry up!
Hey, that means you, too, bozo! Let's go!
translation.zh: 喂 你也一样 傻子 走吧！

translation.en: [man #1] Come on! I said right now!
Hey, open that register real quick.
-Before I blow your fucking head off! -[growling]
-[bartender] Take it easy. I'll open it. -Hey, bozo.
translation.zh: -别急 我正打开着-喂 傻子

translation.en: Hurry up!
I want it!
Hey, man, it's not mine.
It's not mine.
Come on, boy. You're coming with me.
translation.zh: 来吧 小朋友 你跟我走

translation.en: [man #1] All right, big man.
Hey!
What are you looking at?
I'll be out in a minute.
Oh, man. You shouldn't have done that.
translation.zh: 小子 你不该这么做

translation.en: Frank, go around Mike.
translation.zh: 弗兰克 去麦克那里

translation.en: -Duck, Billy! -[gunshot]
Michael.
Michael.
Get those fuckers, Billy.
Get 'em.
Call 911, get an ambulance.
-Now! -Yeah, sure.
[man #1] Oh, shit!
[man #2] Hey, get off my car, you scumbag!
translation.zh: 喂 从我车上滚下来 你这混蛋！

translation.en: -Freeze! -What the hell?
You got five seconds to get off that fucking boat.
translation.zh: 你只有五秒钟离开那艘该死的船

translation.en: Move!
Undo that line.
[man #3] Come on, we got you.
[Billy] l need your fastest boat.
translation.zh: 我需要一艘开得最快的船

translation.en: Who the hell are you?
Police, give me the keys.
Get the hell out of here, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 从这里滚开 你到底在干吗？

translation.en: Give me the fucking keys.
-Where's the boat? -Manhattan Express, right over there.
translation.zh: -船在哪里？-曼哈顿快艇 就在那里

translation.en: [Captain] Hold it!
Get the hell out of that thing.
The Harbor Police will get him.
He killed Michael, Captain.
-Billy, I'm ordering you! -[engine starts]
Damn! Fucking Chinaman don't give up!
translation.zh: 该死！你这不知放弃的中国佬

translation.en: Aviation 0-5-Zebra. Officer 1412 in pursuit of a suspect.
translation.zh: 呼叫飞行机0-5斑马号 警员1412正追踪一名嫌犯

translation.en: I'm in the blue-white speedboat below you. Can you come up over me?
translation.zh: 我在你下方的蓝白快艇上 你可以过来我上方吗？

translation.en: [pilot] Roger, 1412. New York control, this is 0-5-Zebra in pursuit.
translation.zh: 1412 收到 纽约控制局 飞行机0-5斑马正展开追击

translation.en: We're turning south at the Brooklyn Bridge,
translation.zh: 并于布鲁克林大桥上转向南方

translation.en: heading down the river.
That guy is crazy.
Come in closer and drop me a line.
translation.zh: 再飞低一点 然后抛条绳子下来

translation.en: On the count of three, pull me up as fast as you can.
translation.zh: 数到三 你尽快拉我上去

translation.en: One, two, three!
Motherfucker!
Is Daddy coming back soon?
You deliberately disobeyed a direct order!
That man killed my partner.
That's no excuse for blowing up half the goddamn harbor!
translation.zh: 无论出于任何理由 你都不该炸掉半个海港

translation.en: -Captain, listen. -You listen to me, Wong!
translation.zh: 警监 听着 阿黄 你听我说

translation.en: I don't like it any more than you do when a cop gets killed.
translation.zh: 警察被杀 我也和你一样不高兴

translation.en: But we're not in the revenge business.
translation.zh: 但我们不是干报复生意的

translation.en: The Mayor's been up the commissioner's ass over this one, Wong.
translation.zh: 阿黄 市长找了局长一顿麻烦

translation.en: He wants your fucking shield!
translation.zh: 他要收回你那该死的警徽

translation.en: And if he can't get it, he'll take mine!
translation.zh: 若他收不回你的 就会收回我的

translation.en: l had no choice, Captain.
translation.zh: 警监 我是迫于无奈的

translation.en: You could have stood by
and let the Harbor Police pick that guy up.
But, no, gotta be a big hero.
translation.zh: 但你没有 你想当大英雄

translation.en: Billy Wong, Super Cop.
This is it, Billy.
You're back to crowd control.
-But, Captain-- -No fucking buts!
translation.zh: -警长 但是…-没什么“但是”可言！

translation.en: That's final!
Maybe next time you'll think twice
translation.zh: 以后你使出什么花俏的特技时

translation.en: before you pull one of your hot dog stunts.
Now get out of here!
Nice suit, Garoni.
translation.zh: 加伦尼 这件衣服不错

translation.en: Billy, you like it, huh?
I'm supposed to blend in with the crowd.
I heard about your fireworks display in the harbor.
translation.zh: 我听说了你在港口放烟花的事

translation.en: You always did have a flair for the dramatic, Billy boy.
translation.zh: 比利小子 你总有让事情戏剧化的天分

translation.en: How did you get this shit detail?
translation.zh: 你怎么这么快就知道了？

translation.en: The usual.
Some punk pulled a knife on me so I kicked his fucking teeth in.
translation.zh: 有个流氓对我挥刀子 我往他的嘴踢下去

translation.en: And he screamed, "Police brutality!"
All the way to the commissioner's office.
translation.zh: 结果就闹上了局长的办公室

translation.en: The usual bullshit.
The usual bullshit.
You know, if somebody dropped a bomb in here,
translation.zh: 要是有人在这里丢一颗炸弹

translation.en: they'd wipe out half the junior diplomats in New York.
translation.zh: 纽约半数的初级外交官都会被除掉

translation.en: That's why we're here.
-Terrific, I'm glad you made it. -[Danny] That's Laura Shapiro.
translation.zh: -太棒了 我们终于成功了-她是罗娜沙比路

translation.en: -[Laura] It's lovely to see you. -Oh, I'd like to work undercover with her.
translation.zh: -喔 我很乐意当她的密探-很高兴见到你

translation.en: [Laura] No, don't tell me.
You guys are cops?
We're that obvious?
You're not so bad, but, uh, that friend of yours,
translation.zh: 你还不错 但你的朋友呢

translation.en: he sticks out like a sore thumb.
Look, uh, you guys allowed to drink? Can I get you a beer or something?
translation.zh: 瞧 你们能喝酒吗？ 需要为你们准备啤酒什么的吗？

translation.en: No, thanks. Tell you what.
translation.zh: 不了 谢谢 告诉你吧

translation.en: If you wait until I go off duty, I'll buy you a drink.
translation.zh: 若你愿意等我下岗 -我就请你喝一杯-是吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah?
l just might take you up on that.
translation.zh: 我说不定会接受你的邀约呢

translation.en: Um, excuse me, gentlemen. I have to mingle.
translation.zh: 对不起 先生们 我得去交际了

translation.en: That bum, Shapiro, probably uses his own daughter to launder money.
translation.zh: 沙比路那混蛋很可能在利用她女儿来洗黑钱

translation.en: Listen, you lousy Chink bastard, you keep bugging Mr. Shapiro's daughter,
translation.zh: 听着 你这娘娘腔 若你再缠着沙比路先生的女儿

translation.en: they'll scrape you off the floor with a putty knife.
translation.zh: 那只能用油灰刀把你从地板上刮下来

translation.en: His name's Benny Garucci. He's an ex-karate champ.
translation.zh: 他是宾尼加路 前空手道金牌选手

translation.en: I would like to bust his fucking head open with a crowbar.
translation.zh: 我真想用撬棍打破他的死人头

translation.en: But you're gonna have to hold him. He's a tough son of a bitch.
translation.zh: 但你得帮我抓住他 他是个难对付的杂种

translation.en: I wonder why Shapiro needs that kind of muscle here?
translation.zh: 我很好奇沙比路为何要留下这样的筋肉人？

translation.en: Are you kidding? He can afford to have the whole fucking Marine Corps
translation.zh: 你在开玩笑吗？沙比路就算想要组一支海军

translation.en: standing by to protect him if he wanted to.
That fuck owns half of Manhattan, Billy.
translation.zh: 比利 那混蛋掌握了半个曼哈顿

translation.en: l wouldn't mind teaching Garucci a little lesson in manners someday.
translation.zh: 我不介意有天给加路上几堂礼仪课

translation.en: [Laura] Ladies and gentlemen,
Laura Shapiro Marketing is very pleased to introduce to New York City
translation.zh: 罗娜沙比路公司非常荣幸 向纽约市介绍

translation.en: the sensational Edmond Wong
and his fabulous collection of shimmering cocktail wear.
translation.zh: 以及他精彩绝伦的 晚礼服新装作品系列

translation.en: Nice dress.
Nice tits.
[man #4] Everybody hit the ground!
[man #4] The whole warehouse!
No! No! No!
translation.zh: 不要 不要 不要

translation.en: No!
[Captain] New York's finest.
Can't even keep a girl from being snatched right out from under your goddamn noses.
translation.zh: 居然让一个女孩在你的眼皮底下被绑架

translation.en: We had our guns out.
You could've had your dicks out for all the good it did.
translation.zh: 说不定你把下面的“枪”掏出来更好

translation.en: If I take my dick out, I'm gonna use it, Captain.
translation.zh: 警监 若我掏出来了 我就会好好用它

translation.en: We couldn't shoot without hitting the girl.
translation.zh: 贸然开枪会伤到那女孩

translation.en: [Commissioner] I think you two men did the right thing.
Well, thank you, sir. Any word from Shapiro?
translation.zh: 多谢 长官 沙比路说了什么吗？

translation.en: He has no idea why his daughter was snatched.
translation.zh: 他不知道他女儿为何会被绑架

translation.en: We've been monitoring his phone for the past 12 hours.
translation.zh: 在过去的12小时我们监听了他的电话

translation.en: No ransom demands, no orders, nothing.
translation.zh: 没人要求赎金 没任何命令 什么都没有

translation.en: You might find this interesting.
translation.zh: 你或许会觉得这很有趣

translation.en: [Commissioner] What is it?
A record of all the phone calls made in the last 12 hours by Shapiro's hood,
translation.zh: 这是沙比路的保镖在过去12小时内的通话记录

translation.en: Benny Garucci.
Six calls all to the same number.
translation.zh: 六通电话都是来自同一个号码

translation.en: Country code 8-5-2.
-Hong Kong. -[Captain] How the hell did you get this?
A friend of mine at the phone company.
translation.zh: 我有个朋友在通讯公司工作

translation.en: -The blonde? -No, the redhead.
translation.zh: 金发的那位？ 不 红发的那位

translation.en: What the hell does all this got to do with Hong Kong?
translation.zh: 这件事又跟香港有什么关系？

translation.en: There's somebody waiting outside who might just be able to answer that.
translation.zh: 有个人现在在外面等着 说不定能够解答这问题

translation.en: Send in Mr. Cantrell, please.
translation.zh: 请让坎特雷尔先生进来

translation.en: Men, this is Bob Cantrell from the Justice Department.
translation.zh: 先生们 这位是律政司的 鲍比坎特雷尔先生

translation.en: Are these the men who kidnapped Laura Shapiro?
translation.zh: 是这些人劫走罗娜沙比路的吗？

translation.en: Now, how the fuck should we know? They were wearing masks.
translation.zh: 我们怎能认出那些混账啊？ 他们全都戴着面罩

translation.en: Excuse me, lady.
[Billy] What's this all about?
These men all work
translation.zh: 他们全都是替有权有势的

translation.en: for a powerful Hong Kong crime boss named Harold Ko.
translation.zh: 他们全都是替有权有势的 香港罪犯头目高伟洛先生办事的

translation.en: Harold Ko.
What, do you know him?
Anybody who knows Hong Kong knows Ko.
translation.zh: 知道香港的人都知道高伟洛

translation.en: A real snake.
Yeah, and a tough one to catch.
translation.zh: 对 而且不容易抓住

translation.en: Now, we've suspected Shapiro and Ko
translation.zh: 我们怀疑老高和沙比路合作

translation.en: of running drugs from Hong Kong to New York for years,
translation.zh: 把毒品由香港运来纽约已经很久了

translation.en: but we've never been able to pin anything on him.
translation.zh: 但始终没办法找到任何蛛丝马迹

translation.en: Why the hell would Ko wanna snatch Shapiro's daughter?
translation.zh: 老高为何劫走沙比路的女儿？

translation.en: We don't know, maybe they've had a falling out of some kind.
translation.zh: 我们不清楚可能他们出现生意上的纠葛

translation.en: Whatever the reason,
there's a good possibility that Laura Shapiro
translation.zh: 我们绝对有理由相信罗娜沙比路

translation.en: is now being held in Hong Kong.
That's impossible.
Nobody could smuggle a girl into Hong Kong that quickly.
translation.zh: 没人能在这么短的时间内把一名女孩偷运到香港

translation.en: -It's impossible. -Not for Ko.
He's right.
Ko's got most of the island in his back pocket.
translation.zh: 老高暗中掌控了许多小岛

translation.en: Sir, if Laura Shapiro's in Hong Kong we should check it out.
translation.zh: 长官 若罗娜沙比路真的在香港 -我们得去查查-算了吧 阿黄

translation.en: [Captain] Forget it, Wong.
translation.zh: -我们得去查查-算了吧 阿黄

translation.en: My Chinatown contacts can give me the names
translation.zh: 我唐人街的朋友可以帮我

translation.en: of some good informers over there.
It might be worth our try.
Garoni could come with me. He knows Hong Kong from his Vietnam days.
translation.zh: 加伦尼可以跟我一块儿去 他在越战期间曾在香港住过

translation.en: You're way out of line, Wong.
l like it.
If you men could find Laura Shapiro and pin it on Ko,
translation.zh: 若你们能找到罗娜沙比路 并且抓到老高的痛脚

translation.en: you might just be able to shut off the largest heroin pipeline
translation.zh: 说不定你能断绝东方有史以来

translation.en: to ever come out of the Orient.
Okay, we got nothing to lose.
translation.zh: 好 这对我们也没损失

translation.en: Why don't you two men go to Hong Kong as special advisors to the local police
translation.zh: 不如你们就以当地警方 特派指导员的身份去香港

translation.en: and see what you can come up with.
Yes, sir.
See you, Captain.
Thank you, Captain.
[Danny] Thank you.
Here's the keys to that jeep you asked for.
[Billy] Oh, thank you.
-You sure you don't want a driver? -No, we're okay.
translation.zh: -你确定不需要司机吗？-不用了 没关系

translation.en: Thanks for getting this through customs for us, Inspector.
translation.zh: 督察 谢谢你帮我们通过关卡

translation.en: We really appreciate it.
[inspector] Superintendent Whitehead will meet you tomorrow afternoon at four.
translation.zh: 韦德警司将在明天下午4时会见你们

translation.en: -You got it, Billy? -Oh, yeah, thanks. See you tomorrow.
translation.zh: 比利 清楚了吗？ 是 谢谢 明天见

translation.en: -[Danny] Thanks a lot, Inspector. -[Billy] Night.
[inspector] Sleep well.
[Danny] Man, you love it, huh?
translation.zh: 兄弟 你喜欢这一切吧？

translation.en: [Billy] We could stay at a better place, you know?
translation.zh: 其实我们可以住更好的地方你知道吗？

translation.en: We're on an expense account.
Nostalgia, Billy, my boy. Nostalgia.
translation.zh: 怀旧 比利 我的小子 这是怀旧情怀

translation.en: Memories of magic nights on R & R.
translation.zh: 在休息时刻 魔术般夜晚的回忆

translation.en: I remember during Nam,
there was nothing around here but a bunch of horny grunts, you know?
translation.zh: 这里什么都没有只听得见淫叫声 你知道吗？

translation.en: And the women, Billy.
Oh, the women, mother me. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 喔 那些女人 都非常溺爱我呢

translation.en: And besides, nobody's gonna look for us in a dump like this.
translation.zh: 而且没人会在这破地方找我们

translation.en: What's that?
An old Chinese coin.
A friend of mine in Chinatown gave this to me.
translation.zh: 唐人街的一位朋友送我的

translation.en: It's sort of a calling card.
-Oh yeah? -Yeah.
Looks like a bunch of shit to me.
translation.zh: 看起来像是我的一坨屎

translation.en: [Whitehead] I still say it's ludicrous.
The idea that anyone could smuggle a girl into Hong Kong
translation.zh: 你们认为随便将一个女人偷渡来香港

translation.en: without my office knowing about it is simply impossible.
translation.zh: 而我们警方却不知情的想法是不可能的

translation.en: Improbable, not impossible.
translation.zh: 是不太可能 而非完全不可能

translation.en: Now, listen to me, you two.
I spoke to your captain and he told me about your Dodge City tactics.
translation.zh: 我联络了你们的警监 他把你们在道奇城干的好事都告诉了我

translation.en: We don't appreciate people like you in Hong Kong.
translation.zh: 我们不太欢迎你们这样的人到香港来

translation.en: l want you to assure me that you'll behave with the utmost discretion.
translation.zh: 我要你们保证 你们会尽最大程度地保持谨慎

translation.en: Discretion is my middle name, sir.
translation.zh: 长官 我向来都非常谨慎

translation.en: [Whitehead] Show them out, Inspector.
Yes, sir.
[Danny] Thank you, sir.
Gentlemen, you must forgive the superintendent.
translation.zh: 两位 请务必谅解警司的处境

translation.en: He's been trying to nab Ko for years.
translation.zh: 这么多年来 他一直想捉到高伟洛

translation.en: Considers it a personal mission in life.
translation.zh: 这可说是他的毕生任务

translation.en: I think he's worried you will succeed where he has failed all these years.
translation.zh: 我想他是担心你们会成功而他多年来却失败告终

translation.en: Don't worry about it, Inspector. I'm used to pissing off superiors.
translation.zh: 督察 别担心 我习惯惹恼上级

translation.en: We ran down the phone number you gave us.
translation.zh: 你给我们的电话已经查到了

translation.en: "Shanghai Massage Parlor."
That's where Benny Garucci called from New York.
translation.zh: 那是宾尼加路从纽约打来的电话

translation.en: Apparently, it's a rough place.
They, uh, don't necessarily specialize in giving massages,
translation.zh: 他们不仅只提供按摩服务

translation.en: if you know what l mean.
You bet your ass I do.
Let's check this place out. Maybe we can shake Ko's tree a little.
translation.zh: 我们去看看吧 说不定能和老高打打招呼

translation.en: Billy, you're a mind reader.
You two be careful.
One of the reasons Ko has managed to stay out of prison for so long
translation.zh: 老高至今还没被关起来的其中一个原因

translation.en: is he doesn't mind killing anyone who threatens him.
translation.zh: 就是他不介意除掉任何挡道的人

translation.en: If he thinks you're getting too close to finding Laura Shapiro,
translation.zh: 若他认为你们就快找到罗娜沙比路

translation.en: your names will be on the lips of every assassin in Hong Kong.
translation.zh: 你们的名字就会出现在香港所有杀手的名单上

translation.en: It's a friendly little town you got here, Inspector.
translation.zh: 督察 你们的城市真是友善

translation.en: Welcome to Hong Kong.
[Danny] This is my favorite part of town, Billy.
translation.zh: 比利 这是我最喜欢的地方

translation.en: We're supposed to be working here.
You know what they say, "All work, no play."
translation.zh: 你听过“只工作不娱乐天才也会变傻子”吧？

translation.en: Play around here can get us killed.
translation.zh: 在这里娱乐是会死人的

translation.en: [Danny] Whoops. Sorry.
At least you'd die with a smile on your face.
translation.zh: 至少你会面带笑容地死去

translation.en: -[woman] 105 dollars, please. -Thank you. Please come again next time.
translation.zh: -多谢 105元-拿去用 多谢 下次再来吧

translation.en: Welcome, gentlemen. First time here?
translation.zh: 欢迎两位 第一次来吗？

translation.en: We're just a couple of poor lost souls from New York.
translation.zh: 我们是来自纽约的两颗寂寞的心

translation.en: A good friend of ours recommended this place very highly.
translation.zh: 我们有位好友推荐这里说这里是首屈一指的

translation.en: We have many friends in New York.
translation.zh: 我们在纽约有很多熟客

translation.en: Maybe you remember our friend. His name's Benny Garucci.
translation.zh: 也许你认识我们的朋友 他叫宾尼加路

translation.en: Yeah, Benny Garucci. Benny Garucci, he really loves this place.
translation.zh: 对 宾尼加路 宾尼加路很喜欢这里

translation.en: He talks about it all the time.
-Right, Billy? -[Billy] Right.
So sorry, we... we have so many friends. I can't remember them all.
translation.zh: 真抱歉 我们有很多熟客 我不可能全都记得住

translation.en: But I'm sure we can make your visit here very exciting.
translation.zh: 但我能保证让你们感受到非常刺激的享受

translation.en: Follow, please.
[Danny] All right.
[Billy] Hey.
Keep your eyes open.
[Danny] Don't worry, Billy boy. l wouldn't miss this for the world.
translation.zh: 放心 比利 我绝不会错过的

translation.en: Billy, don't let this guy sneak up on me.
translation.zh: 比利 别让他爬到我身上来

translation.en: Hey, Garoni?
I'm gonna get you.
You know, you're very pretty.
[Danny] My goodness gracious. What do we got here?
translation.zh: 我的天啊 这是怎么回事？

translation.en: Billy.
Yeah.
[Billy] Thank you.
[Danny] Billy, look at this, huh?
Whichever one you want is yours, Billy, huh?
translation.zh: 比利 你看中哪一位？

translation.en: -[Billy] Okay, hello. -You made the wrong choice.
That's... I'm in love, this is mine.
translation.zh: 这…我爱上她了 她是我的

translation.en: I'm your friend, you gotta take care of your friends, don't you?
translation.zh: 我是你的朋友你得照顾好朋友 对吧？

translation.en: [Danny] Come on, little baby.
Excuse me.
So...
[Danny] Phone-in the other girl, okay.
Go ahead, make the phone call.
[woman #1] Ask Becky here, please.
l remember these holes when they were a little smaller, you know?
translation.zh: 我记得以前这些洞口比较小你知道吗？

translation.en: What do we got here?
Welcome to.
Welcome to.
This chick loves me.
You love my clothes?
[Danny] I love your clothes.
You remind me of someone I knew in Saigon.
translation.zh: 你让我想起一个在胡志明市认识的人

translation.en: Oh, you know Saigon.
translation.zh: 喔 你知道胡志明市吧？

translation.en: You're very beautiful, really.
translation.zh: 你真的很漂亮 真的

translation.en: No, you are.
[Danny] How old are you?
Eighteen?
You guess.
[Danny] Excuse me.
[woman #1] Yes.
She really knows a way to a man's heart.
translation.zh: 她真的知道如何取悦男人的心

translation.en: [Danny] When did you grow a beard?
[Danny] Oh! Oh, yes.
[Danny] What the hell?
Shit!
[Danny] Oh! Damn it!
You punk!
Drop it, motherfucker!
No, you drop it.
translation.zh: 不 你才要把枪放下

translation.en: Motherfucker.
Oh, shit, what the fuck is going on here, huh?
translation.zh: 喔 真糟糕 这是怎么回事？

translation.en: Dress them and take them to my office.
translation.zh: 让他们穿上衣服然后带到我的办公室

translation.en: l wanna talk to them before we kill them.
translation.zh: 在杀死他们前 得问个明白

translation.en: Hey!
A guy can't take a bath in peace?
translation.zh: 难道不能让我们好好洗澡吗？

translation.en: Why did Shapiro send you?
translation.zh: 沙比路让你们到这来干吗？

translation.en: Shapiro?
-Hey, wait a minute. -l think you know why he sent us.
translation.zh: -喂 等等-我想你比我们更清楚

translation.en: Oh, Shapiro?
Oh, sure, he's very angry at you people, very angry.
translation.zh: 喔 当然 他对你们非常不满

translation.en: Shapiro's angry at us?
That's right, yeah.
But he's the one who--
Don't say anything! These men are New York cop.
translation.zh: -但却是他…-什么都别说！ 他们是纽约来的警察

translation.en: -[Danny] Cops? -[Billy] Cops?
l am not a cop, I'm a tourist.
translation.zh: 我不是警察 我只是游客啊

translation.en: -Maybe he's a cop. You a cop? -[Billy] Do I look like a cop?
translation.zh: -说不定他是警察 你是警察吗？-我像是警察吗？

translation.en: He doesn't look like a cop.
Take 'em out.
Kill 'em.
Tell Harold Ko we're in town.
translation.zh: 告诉高伟洛 我们已经来了

translation.en: His days are numbered.
It's never wise to make threats, my young friend.
translation.zh: 恐吓绝对是不明智的 我亲爱的朋友

translation.en: Especially, ones you can't keep.
translation.zh: 尤其是对你抓不到的人恐吓

translation.en: That's not a threat.
That's a promise.
Let's go.
Whatever you say, partner.
Well, you're calling the shots, Billy. What do we do next, huh?
translation.zh: 比利 你来控制大局吧 我们接着该怎么办？

translation.en: Here.
What is it with this coin?
[Billy] Tomorrow we're going to cash this in.
translation.zh: 我们明天就兑现这铜钱

translation.en: If we use it right, it may tell us everything we want to know about Mr. Ko.
translation.zh: 若我们用对了方法 它能告诉我们高先生的一切

translation.en: [Danny] This Lee Hing, is he an informer?
[Billy] He used to be.
He's retired, but he's still tapped into the whole Hong Kong underworld.
translation.zh: 他退休了 但他还是密切留意着香港的黑社会局势

translation.en: [Danny] Well, what makes you think he'll help us?
translation.zh: 你为何觉得他会帮助我们？

translation.en: He may not, but do you have anything better to do today?
translation.zh: 他或许会袖手旁观 但你现在有其他办法吗？

translation.en: Well, as a matter of fact, l could probably think of something.
translation.zh: 事实上 我也许能想到些好办法

translation.en: What happened to your eye?
It's swollen, l think something bit me.
translation.zh: 肿了 我觉得我被叮了一口

translation.en: You better watch out for Hong Kong mosquito wearing high heels.
translation.zh: 那你要小心点了香港的蚊子都穿着高跟鞋

translation.en: [Danny] Hey, that's the Jumbo Restaurant!
Boy, do I remember that.
But I don't remember the rest of this new shit.
translation.zh: 但我认不出其他新事物

translation.en: It all looks kind of different to me, Billy.
translation.zh: 比利 这对我而言都有点不同了

translation.en: [Billy] There's Lee Hing's boat.
[Danny] Looks like our friend's doing okay.
I bring you greetings from a friend in New York.
translation.zh: 纽约的一位朋友让我来问候你

translation.en: Who is your friend?
His name is Tin Ho.
Tin Ho is a very old and honorable friend.
translation.zh: 贺天是值得尊敬的老朋友

translation.en: -Now, Mr. Hing, look, we've just come-- -You are police officers from New York.
translation.zh: 李先生 我们是… 你们是纽约来的警察

translation.en: You have come here looking for a girl who was kidnapped by Ko.
translation.zh: 你们是为了找一个被老高劫来香港的女孩

translation.en: Gentlemen, there are no secrets in Hong Kong.
translation.zh: 先生们 香港是没有秘密的

translation.en: Come, sit and have some tea with me.
translation.zh: 过来吧 坐下和我喝杯茶

translation.en: It's the least I can do.
Seeing as how you have come all the way to see me for nothing.
translation.zh: 看在你们大老远跑来见我 却一无所获

translation.en: Soo Ling, chá for our guests.
translation.zh: 小玲 冲壶茶来招呼客人

translation.en: Why is our trip for nothing?
Surely, you can help us.
Surely, l could.
translation.zh: 当然 我是有办法的

translation.en: But I will not.
My father's retired.
[Stan] Ahoy, Uncle Hing.
I've got a charter in a few hours. Can I hit you for some supplies?
translation.zh: 几小时后 有人会租我的船 我能先跟你买点货吗？

translation.en: On credit, I suppose.
At least I'm consistent.
Hey, how are you doing there, buddy? I got something for you, look at this.
translation.zh: 兄弟 你最近在忙什么？ 我给你带来点东西 瞧瞧

translation.en: Straight from the mainland. There you go.
translation.zh: 大陆带来的 拿去吧

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
Mr. Hing.
If you know anything about where Ko is keeping this girl,
translation.zh: 若你知道老高把那女孩藏在哪里

translation.en: you gotta tell us.
My daughter was quite correct.
l am retired.
But a man like you must maintain his contacts.
translation.zh: 但像你这样的人肯定知道

translation.en: Could you have them find out for us?
translation.zh: 你能帮我们找到他们吗？

translation.en: Gentlemen, dealing in information like that is extremely dangerous.
translation.zh: 先生们 处理这些情报是非常危险的

translation.en: Especially, when it involves people like Harold Ko.
translation.zh: 尤其这牵涉到像高伟洛这样的人

translation.en: Listen, if there's something you're not telling us, we can take you in
translation.zh: 听着 若你有事瞒着我们我们会逮住你

translation.en: and let the local cops deal with you.
Are these men bothering you, sir?
translation.zh: 兴叔 他们打扰到你了吗？

translation.en: [Hing] That is not necessary, Stan.
These gentlemen are simply tired and frustrated.
translation.zh: 这两位先生只不过是累了且急了

translation.en: Forgive them.
They are dangerous, Father. Make them leave before they bring trouble.
translation.zh: 爸爸 他们很危险 在他们带来麻烦前 快让他们离开

translation.en: Don't look now, but I think they already have.
translation.zh: 别看了 我想他们已经带来了麻烦

translation.en: Damn it, they must have followed us, Billy.
translation.zh: 该死 比利 他们肯定是跟踪了我们

translation.en: No.
You're gonna take me to Ko right now, asshole.
translation.zh: 混账 现在就带我去见老高

translation.en: Shit!
You see? You see the trouble you cause? Why wouldn't you leave us alone?
translation.zh: 你看到了吗？你看到你惹的麻烦了吗？ 你为何来打扰我们？

translation.en: Hey, give me a break.
Tin Ho has asked a favor of me.
l must honor it.
Do you think that's wise, Uncle?
translation.zh: 兴叔 你觉得这样是明智的吗？

translation.en: Maybe not.
But sometimes honor is not wise.
translation.zh: 但有时尊敬是不明智的

translation.en: Can you tell me where Ko's holding Laura Shapiro?
translation.zh: 你可以告诉我老高把罗娜沙比路扣留在哪吗？

translation.en: Not yet, but my friends will know.
translation.zh: 还不能 但我的朋友会知道

translation.en: Uh...
Do you have a picture of the girl?
translation.zh: 你有没有那女孩的照片？

translation.en: Right here.
Come back here tomorrow.
Stan will know where to find me.
translation.zh: 斯坦知道能在哪里找到我

translation.en: Well, thanks, we really appreciate it.
translation.zh: 太好了 谢谢 真是麻烦你了

translation.en: Thanks.
What the fuck is this?
[Billy] Who's this?
[Harorld] I hope we can say I'm a friend.
translation.zh: 我希望我能说我们是朋友

translation.en: [Billy] Listen, you creep.
It's not your money we want, it's your ass.
translation.zh: 我们不要你的钱 而是要你的命

translation.en: [Harold] I'm sorry to hear that. Goodbye, Mr. Wong.
translation.zh: 那就非常遗憾了 再见 黄先生

translation.en: -Danny. -[gunshot]
Holy shit, Garoni!
Get the window, Billy, I got downstairs.
translation.zh: 比利 你去窗外看看 我到楼下去

translation.en: [Harold] You fools failed.
Sit down.
l spoke to your captain again.
translation.zh: 我刚跟你们的警监通过电话

translation.en: He assured me that a machine gun is most definitely not standard issue
translation.zh: 他向我保证 机关枪对纽约市警察来说

translation.en: to New York City police.
I never go anywhere in Southeast Asia without an Uzi.
translation.zh: 我从来不会不带乌兹枪到东南亚

translation.en: Do you know what this is?
This is an initial estimate of the damage you caused.
translation.zh: 这是你们造成的损坏预估报告

translation.en: Look, at least we know we're getting close to Ko.
translation.zh: 听着 至少我们知道 我们接近老高了

translation.en: Otherwise, he wouldn't have tried to wipe us out like that.
translation.zh: 否则他不会想除掉我们

translation.en: Oh, you have evidence that Ko is behind the attack?
translation.zh: 那你有证据证明老高是这些袭击的幕后黑手吗？

translation.en: Jolly good, let's see it then.
translation.zh: 真高兴 让我们瞧瞧吧

translation.en: I think it's obvious, don't you?
translation.zh: 我想这很明显 不是吗？

translation.en: You want to know what kind of reputation Harold Ko has in Hong Kong?
translation.zh: 你们想知道老高在香港的地位吗？

translation.en: Read that!
He spent three million American dollars to purchase that horse.
translation.zh: 他花了三百万美金买了那只马

translation.en: And he's holding a press conference this afternoon
translation.zh: 还会在今午召开记者招待会

translation.en: to announce that all its race winnings will be donated
translation.zh: 宣布这只马赢得的奖金 将会全数捐给殖民地孤儿基金

translation.en: to the Colony's Orphan Fund.
translation.zh: 将会全数捐给殖民地孤儿基金

translation.en: He's a real fucking peach.
I'm warning you two.
I've already wired your commissioner to ask him to take you off this case.
translation.zh: 我已联络你们的局长 让他下令禁止你们调查这起案件

translation.en: If I have to set eyes on you again, there'll be bloody hell to pay!
translation.zh: 若让我再瞧见你们 你们就会吃不了兜着走！

translation.en: -Can we go now? -Get the hell out of here!
translation.zh: -那我们能走了吗？-给我走得越远越好！

translation.en: [Danny] This Whitehead's a real schmuck.
So, what are we gonna do next, Billy?
translation.zh: 比利 我们下一步该怎么办？

translation.en: [Billy] There's still Lee Hing.
Let's hope he comes up with something.
ln the meantime, do you like horses?
translation.zh: 与此同时 你喜欢马啊？

translation.en: [Danny] I love horses.
Ladies and gentlemen, as you all know, Stolen Fortune,
translation.zh: 各位嘉宾 如你们所知道的 史上最成功的马匹 武林盟主

translation.en: the most successful horse of all time,
translation.zh: 史上最成功的马匹 武林盟主

translation.en: sired only one son before he was killed in a tragic fire.
translation.zh: 在不幸葬生于火海之前 只生了一只雄马

translation.en: The son, Breakaway Threat, was the horse they said no one could buy.
translation.zh: 它的孩子 武林真主 他们都说没人买得下它

translation.en: They were wrong.
Thank you.
It's my pleasure to present my latest acquisition...
translation.zh: 我很荣幸能向香港人介绍

translation.en: Breakaway Threat, to the people of Hong Kong.
translation.zh: 武林真主 我最近采购的马匹

translation.en: [man #6] Mr. Ko, how much money do you think Breakaway Threat
translation.zh: 高先生 你觉得武林真主

translation.en: will be able to earn for the Orphan Fund?
translation.zh: 能替孤儿基金赚多少钱呢？

translation.en: [Harold] We hope to donate almost two million dollars
translation.zh: 我们希望 在完成下一季赛马前

translation.en: by the end of the next racing season.
Mr. Ko, how soon will Breakaway Threat be able to race?
translation.zh: 高先生 请问武林真主何时才能出赛？

translation.en: Breakaway Threat will be running one week from Saturday.
translation.zh: 武林真主将在下周六出赛

translation.en: [Billy] Hey, Ko.
You left your briefcase in our hotel room.
translation.zh: 你把公事包 留在我们酒店房里了

translation.en: I think you are mistaken, sir.
translation.zh: 先生 我想你搞错了

translation.en: Well, if this isn't your briefcase,
translation.zh: 好吧 若这不是你的公事包

translation.en: then this isn't your money either.
translation.zh: 那里面的钱都不是你的了

translation.en: [Danny] I don't think this guy Ko likes you, Billy.
translation.zh: 比利 我不认为老高喜欢你

translation.en: [Billy] That's too bad.
[Danny] Are you surprised to see Garucci here?
translation.zh: -你看见高路会惊讶吗？-不见得

translation.en: Not really. Right now, we have more important business to take care of.
translation.zh: -你看见高路会惊讶吗？-不见得 但此刻 我们有更重要的事情要办

translation.en: You follow Garucci.
I'll go see what Lee Hing's dug up.
translation.zh: 我去看看李兴有否查获情报

translation.en: Whatever you say, kid.
[Billy] If your father can help us,
translation.zh: 若你爸爸愿意帮助我们

translation.en: we can shut down one of the worst criminals in the world.
translation.zh: 我们便可以拿下其中一名世上最糟糕的罪犯

translation.en: There's no dishonor in that.
Everything will be fine, you'll see.
translation.zh: 一切都会没事的 等着瞧

translation.en: Cove ahead.
[Billy] Oh, shit.
[Soo Ling] No!
Oh, no.
[Soo Ling] Father!
Father!
No!
[Stan] Too late now.
Billy, for Christ's sake, keep her back!
translation.zh: 比利 老天 阻止她！

translation.en: Soo Ling!
No.
No! No! No! [sobs]
You. You're the cause of this.
translation.zh: 是你 是你把事情搞得如斯田地

translation.en: You killed my father!
No, l didn't kill your father.
translation.zh: 不 不是我害死你爸爸

translation.en: Harold Ko killed your father.
I hate you! I hate you!
If you hate me, then you must hate Ko.
translation.zh: 你要是恨我 不如恨高伟洛

translation.en: Help me find him.
Help me destroy the man who killed your father.
translation.zh: 帮我摧毁杀死你父亲的男人

translation.en: Father!
[Soo Ling] My father told me to help you.
Even though he's dead,
I must obey.
The fortune-teller was a friend of my father's.
translation.zh: 这里的算命师父是我爸爸的朋友

translation.en: If my father found out anything, the fortune-teller will know.
translation.zh: 若我爸爸发现任何线索 这位算命师会知道的

translation.en: You look for a girl
that was taken from New York by Mr. Ko.
translation.zh: 在纽约被高先生捉走的一名女孩

translation.en: How do you know?
The I Ching tells all.
Nothing is hidden.
There has been war.
Between Ko and Shapiro?
translation.zh: 老高与沙比路之间的战争？

translation.en: Yes, but the war is over.
translation.zh: 对 但这场战争结束了

translation.en: A man has come across the water to make peace.
translation.zh: 某个人为了和平越过了重重大洋

translation.en: Benny Garucci.
[fortune teller] Yes.
My people tell me a pact will be made tomorrow night.
translation.zh: 我的人告诉我 他们将在明晚达成协议

translation.en: And the girl will be returned.
translation.zh: 而那名女孩将会被释放

translation.en: Where's the girl?
I do not know.
But you must not look for her.
The I Ching is not good.
I see only danger...
death,
and betrayal.
Thanks.
Wait a minute.
l must say a prayer for my father and consult the I Ching.
translation.zh: 我要为我爸爸祷告 以及向《易经》问卜

translation.en: What do your sticks say? Is the fortune-teller right?
translation.zh: 你这支签怎么说？ 算命师的话准确吗？

translation.en: I ask the questions, Billy.
But I never read the answers.
-[man #7] Close the door. -[man #8] Thanks.
[Harold] l trust you found the girl, well?
translation.zh: 我相信你已经找到那女孩了吧？

translation.en: Yes, sir, just as you promised.
translation.zh: 是的 先生 就像你所说的

translation.en: When Mr. Shapiro refused to pay for my last shipment,
translation.zh: 当沙比路先生不肯为我的货运付钱

translation.en: l lost much face.
l trust it will never happen again.
translation.zh: 我相信 这不会再发生了

translation.en: It was a simple misunderstanding, sir.
translation.zh: 先生 这只是小误会

translation.en: Be assured that Mr. Shapiro remains your faithful friend and partner.
translation.zh: 请确信沙比路先生仍当你是忠诚的朋友和伙伴

translation.en: He wishes no ill feeling towards you.
I'm glad to hear this.
[Benny] But Mr. Shapiro is worried.
Those two cops from New York,
they're getting too close to our operation.
Calm your fears.
The girl should be returned to you tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚就会将那女孩交还给你

translation.en: As for those two police officers,
they cause me great dishonor.
translation.zh: 他们带给了我巨大的耻辱

translation.en: They will be taken care of.
Garucci went to this big container shipyard
before he went to see Ko.
translation.zh: 去了间造船厂的大货柜

translation.en: Now, it's my guess he was checking on the girl
translation.zh: 我想他是在和老高交易谈判前

translation.en: before arranging an exchange with the big man.
translation.zh: 我想他是在和老高交易谈判前 去查看那女孩

translation.en: The fortune-teller said the exchange will be made tonight.
translation.zh: 算命师说他们今晚就会进行交易

translation.en: So, we have to break in and get the girl out before that can happen.
translation.zh: 所以我们要赶在交易成功前闯进去救走女孩

translation.en: [Stan] Tall order, man.
The rumors I hear say the place is Ko's drug factory.
translation.zh: 我听人说过 那是老高的制毒工厂

translation.en: It will be heavily guarded.
Maybe we should call Whitehead, Billy.
translation.zh: 比利 我想我们得通知韦德

translation.en: Hold it.
We're not sure it's the drug factory.
translation.zh: 我们不确定那里是制毒工厂

translation.en: We're not sure Laura Shapiro's there.
translation.zh: 也不知道罗娜沙比路是否真的被困在那里

translation.en: If we're wrong, Whitehead will ship us home.
translation.zh: 若我们错了 韦德会驱逐我们回家

translation.en: l will go with you.
That's a great idea.
l can handle myself in a fight.
translation.zh: 我能在搏斗中照顾好自己

translation.en: [Stan] We know you can, Soo Ling.
But someone has to stay behind just in case we're caught.
translation.zh: 但始终要有人留下 以免我们失败

translation.en: That's your job.
He's right, honey.
Now, if you don't hear from us three hours after we hit the place,
translation.zh: 我们进去三小时后 若没有消息

translation.en: you call Whitehead, understand? Call.
translation.zh: 你就联络韦德 好吗？联络他

translation.en: Don't worry, Soo Ling, I'll go with them.
translation.zh: 别担心 小玲 我会和他们一起

translation.en: You have experience in this kind of things?
Yeah, you might say that.
Seals, US Navy.
[Stan] As a matter of fact,
I just happen to have some of my old gear with me.
It might just come in handy.
[Danny] What the fuck is that?
[Stan] I got that from an Israeli friend of mine.
translation.zh: 我以色列的朋友给我的

translation.en: That's a portable, six-shot, 20-millimeter cannon.
translation.zh: 口径20毫米 共6发的手提火箭炮

translation.en: I'll be a son of a bitch.
I ain't never seen anything like that.
translation.zh: 我都没见过这样的东西

translation.en: -Have you, Billy? -No.
The entrance is about four containers in.
translation.zh: 入口就在里面的第四个货柜

translation.en: It's a gray door.
About four containers on top of that
there's an air duct connected to an air conditioner.
That's how we go in.
-All right? -[Stan] All right.
-[Billy] Let's do it. -[Danny] Okay.
[man #9] Okay, all signed out.
You wait here.
I'll bring down Laura Shapiro.
translation.zh: 我会带罗娜沙比路下来

translation.en: She better be all right.
I'll go first.
I'll be right behind you, Billy boy. You got my back, Jones?
translation.zh: 我会跟在你身后 比利小子琼斯 你跟着我吧？

translation.en: -I got it. -All right, let's go.
Okay.
Drop your guns.
Billy!
Billy!
Billy.
I told you the Japanese make great bulletproof vests.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你 日本人的防弹衣很不错

translation.en: Let's get those fuckers!
Everybody out!
Come on, move out of this joint, let' s go!
-Come on, let's move it! -Out!
-[gasps] -Am I talking to myself here? Go!
translation.zh: 我是在和自己说话吗？走！

translation.en: -Come on, let's go! -[Stan] Let's move! Let's go!
[Danny] Hold it!
-Up! Up! Up! -What happened?
Don't you understand English, guy.
-[Laura] The guard has the key. -Give me the key
-or I'll blow your dick off! -Key, key! Come on! Key! Key!
translation.zh: -不然我一枪轰了你下体！-钥匙拿来！快！钥匙！

translation.en: What's the matter, you never seen four naked broads before? Let's go!
translation.zh: 怎么了？没见过四名裸体女子吗？ 快离开！

translation.en: -Go! -[women whimpering]
-[Danny] Good to see you again, Laura. -Yeah. Hell of a way to get a date.
translation.zh: -很高兴再见到你 罗娜-真是搭讪的好方法

translation.en: That's very funny.
Got it?
[Stan] The other one!
-What the fuck's going on? -They're gonna blow the lab up.
translation.zh: -发生了什么事？-他们要炸掉实验室 这边啊

translation.en: This one.
-Got it? You got it? -Go.
translation.zh: -搞定了 去吧-你搞定了吗？

translation.en: Okay.
-You got it, almost ready? -[Billy] Yeah.
[Danny] Come on, kid, let's go, we're on a count!
translation.zh: 快走 女孩们 走吧我们时间不多了！

translation.en: -[Stan] Yeah, I'm ready. -[Billy] Let's go!
-[Stan] With me? -[Billy] Yes, sir.
[Stan] This sucker's got keys. Come on, let's roll it.
translation.zh: 这里有钥匙 来吧 快开车吧

translation.en: [Danny] Let's get the--
[Stan] Watch out, man! Hurry it up!
translation.zh: 开枪 别让他们离开

translation.en: Where's Laura Shapiro?
The man asked you a question.
Fuck you.
Surely, you know we can make you talk.
translation.zh: 你该知道我们有办法让你说话

translation.en: l got news for you Ko.
translation.zh: 老高 我有事要告诉你

translation.en: You're finished, you're already dead and you don't know it yet.
translation.zh: 你完蛋了 你死到临头却还不知道

translation.en: This is all so unnecessary.
Enjoy yourself, Benny.
Hello?
This is Billy Wong.
You've got a problem, Ko.
translation.zh: 老高 这次你有麻烦了

translation.en: [Harold] I've got a problem?
If you don't give me Garoni, I'm not releasing Laura Shapiro to anyone.
translation.zh: 若你不把加伦尼放了 我也不会把罗娜沙比路放给任何人

translation.en: If you kill Garoni, she disappears.
translation.zh: 若你杀了加伦尼 她也将随之消失

translation.en: I'm surprised.
l had no idea your partner's life meant so much to you.
translation.zh: 我没想到 你拍档的性命对你这么重要

translation.en: [Harold] I believe we can do business, Mr. Wong.
translation.zh: 黄先生 我想我们能做笔买卖

translation.en: Shall we say, in my shipping yard?
translation.zh: 我应该说 在我的造船厂里讨论吗？

translation.en: In two hours.
I'll be there.
Stan will take you to Whitehead.
He will get you home.
Look, I don't mind staying in hiding until you can get Garoni back.
translation.zh: 听着 我不介意躲起来 直到你们找回加伦尼为止

translation.en: That's okay.
Get Laura to Whitehead.
Tell him to have as many men as possible at Ko's shipyard at exactly 7:00 a.m.
translation.zh: 请他在早上7点正时 尽量多带点人到老高的造船厂

translation.en: If he's late, there's gonna be lots of dead bodies to pick up.
translation.zh: 若他迟了 那就需要替更多人收尸了

translation.en: You're not going in there alone, are you?
translation.zh: 你不是想自己单独进去吧？

translation.en: Yeah, this is between me, Benny Garucci, and Harold Ko.
translation.zh: 没错 这是我、宾尼加路和高伟洛之间的 私人恩怨

translation.en: [Harold] Mr. Wong.
How nice to see you.
Where's Garoni?
Where's Laura Shapiro?
My partner first.
But, of course.
You bastard.
I've lived up to my part of the bargain, Mr. Wong.
translation.zh: 黄先生 我已经履行了我的交易

translation.en: Now, where is the girl?
translation.zh: 现在 那女孩在哪呢？

translation.en: She's safe.
[Whitehead] She certainly is.
[Billy] Whitehead.
l warned you, Wong.
translation.zh: 阿黄 我早就警告你了

translation.en: Mr. Ko is a very influential man in Hong Kong.
translation.zh: 高先生在香港是很有势力的大人物

translation.en: You son of a bitch.
Oh, yes, but a well-paid one.
translation.zh: 没错 但是个收入丰厚的混账

translation.en: Well, it seems that this affair will come to a happy ending after all.
translation.zh: 好吧 看来这件事 终于有了完美的结局了

translation.en: There only remains one last piece of entertainment.
translation.zh: 似乎只剩下 最后一项余兴节目了

translation.en: [Benny] Come on, big boy.
You son of a bitch!
Come on.
Bill.
Soo Ling, you help Laura, I'll take care of Garoni.
translation.zh: 小玲 你上去解开罗娜的绳子我去帮忙加伦尼

translation.en: [inspector] Going somewhere, Superintendent?
[Harold] Start the engine. Start the engine.
Go! Stop him. Stop him!
Get me out of here.
No.
Run him down!
Shit.
[Danny] Jesus Christ.
Give me that fucking thing.
Give it to me, come on.
Come on!
[mayor] In recognition of service above and beyond the call of duty,
translation.zh: 为了奖励超越了 警察职责范围的服务

translation.en: which resulted in the forfeiture of over 2,000 pounds of illicit drugs
translation.zh: 即成功充公了 由香港运至纽约

translation.en: en route from Hong Kong to New York,
the Police Department of the City of New York
is proud to bestow it's departmental Medal of Honor
translation.zh: 很荣幸能够颁发部门荣誉勋章

translation.en: on officers Wong and Garoni.
translation.zh: 予黄警员和加伦尼警员

translation.en: Thanks, Captain.
It's good to be home.
What's our next assignment, Cap?
translation.zh: 警监 我们的下一个任务是什么？

translation.en: Crowd control.
Congratulations.
-Well done, Garoni. -[Danny] Thank you, sir.
translation.zh: -做得好 加伦尼-谢谢 长官

translation.en: [Danny] Thank you, Mr. Mayor.
Subtitle translation by Su Yee Wong
